Actions.Name: Sneaky Stab
Actions.Effects: Attack deals bonus damage to and does not break stealth against bloodied or blinded foes.

Actions.Name: Throwing Knife
Actions.Description: A foe in range takes damage equal to its distance from the [name].

Actions.Name: Blinding Dust
Actions.Description: An adjacent foe becomes blinded. The [name] then may dash 2 and gains stealth.
